channel.title: Help with a command please :)
channel.description:
hello guys :)
i have a 317 server, and i want to add the command [u][u][b]::empty[/b][/u][/u] but i dont know how, can you please give me the command?
with thanks :]

item.title: Help with a command please :)
item.dc:creator: @Unruling Unruling
item.description:
@Unruling wrote:

Add this void
public void removeAllItems() {
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
playerItems[i] = 0;
}
for (int i = 0; i < playerItemsN.length; i++) {
playerItemsN[i] = 0;
}
resetItems(3214);

Heres the command

}
if (command.startsWith(“empty”)) {
long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (now - lastAction < 60000) {
sM(“You must wait 60 seconds after an action to ::empty!”);
lastAction = now;
} else {
removeAllItems();
}
}

Read full topic
